title: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar - One North Residences
blurb: Authentic Melbourne cafe lifestyle, open daily.
description: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar brings the authentic Melbourne cafe lifestyle to Singapore. The One North location is open daily from 8AM to 4PM. Enjoy specialty coffee, delicious brunch options, and a relaxed atmosphere perfect for families and individuals alike. A great spot for a casual meal or a coffee break.
full_address: Bringing you the authentic Melbourne café lifestyle to life ONE NORTH Open daily | 8AM to 4PM #01-51 One-North Residences, 9 One-north Gateway Singapore 138643 BOOK YOUR TABLE PLQ (PARKSIDE) Open daily | 8AM to 10PM #01-10 Park Place Residences Singapore 409053 BOOK YOUR TABLE

title: Jimmy Monkey PLQ and One-North Lunch Specials
blurb: Delicious lunch sets, different menu daily, monthly updates.
description: Enjoy diverse lunch sets crafted by our top chef, with exciting monthly updates. Available Monday to Friday from 11am to 3pm at both PLQ and One-North outlets. Indulge in a culinary experience designed to tantalize your taste buds with fresh, innovative flavors. Perfect for a midday treat or a business lunch, our specials offer something for everyone. Discover new favorites and savor the quality ingredients in every dish. A delightful dining experience awaits you at Jimmy Monkey.

title: Jimmy Monkey Cafe: Unwind and Toast to Good Times
blurb: Enjoy 1 for 1 drinks, beer, wine, and champagne.
description: Jimmy Monkey offers a range of beverages, including beer, wine, and champagne, perfect for unwinding with friends. They also provide specialty coffee with handpicked blends from Independent and Rainforest Alliance farms. Experience the roasting and indulge in the whole coffee experience. It's a great place for parents to relax and enjoy a drink or coffee while socializing.
datetime_display: Monkey, we go by — life is short, enjoy it to the maximum, with a drink in hand

title: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar - A Coffee Experience
blurb: Experience specialty coffee and delicious food options.
description: Jimmy Monkey Cafe & Bar offers a unique coffee experience with a focus on specialty coffee and a diverse menu of food options. It's a great place for families to enjoy a meal or a coffee break. The cafe provides a relaxed atmosphere suitable for both adults and children. They offer a range of dishes, from brunch items to heartier meals, ensuring there's something for everyone. The cafe is known for its quality coffee and friendly service, making it a popular spot for families looking for a casual dining experience.

title: Jimmy Monkey Cafe Bistro Venue Information
blurb: Cafe by Day, Bistro by Night venue information.
description: Jimmy Monkey Cafe Bistro offers a unique experience transitioning from a cafe during the day to a bistro at night. It provides a versatile dining atmosphere suitable for families and individuals alike. The venue features a diverse menu catering to various tastes, making it an ideal spot for casual meals and special occasions. The cafe bistro aims to create a welcoming environment for all patrons, with a focus on quality food and excellent service. It is a great place for families to enjoy a meal together in a relaxed setting.
